review: i like it but it take awhile to exit
author: alexis mitchell radford sr

review: It does everything it sets out to do fantastically! However, they are lacking in a few apps that I, personally, almost require. The apps are CrunchyRoll, and The Mormon Channel. I traded out my old Roku device for this, and am thinking I may plug the roku back in just to get my channels back. I am well aware i'm outside the majority of customers with this complaint, but for me they are very important (as important as TV can be ahah).
author: Dustin

review: Works great allot better than the Roku Streaming stick 3400m I was using
author: William Fairbourne

review: Fire stick is very easy to use, had a google crome cast first but much prefer the fire stick. The remote is the best part compared to crome cast where you have to yous other devices. Also seems that the fire stick is a bit faster with less freezing

review: For $39 this is a no brainier especially if you have Amazon Prime.  So easy to use.
